question: Comet Hale-Bopp orbits the sun every 75 years. Eric's uncle saw the Comet when he was 42 years old. Eric saw the comet a second time when he was two times the age his uncle was when he saw the Comet. How old was Eric when he saw the Comet for the first time?
answer:
Eric saw the Comet for the second time when he was 42 years * 2= <<42*2=84>>84 years old.
Comet Hale-Bopp can be seen every 75 years, so Eric saw the comet for the first time when he was 84 years - 75 years = <<84-75=9>>9 years old.
